document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 95-18
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON REPEALING SECTIONS 12600 - 12612, 12278.11, 12279.11, 12021, 12022, 12023, 12024, 12025, 12026, 12027, 12028, AND 12091(10) OF THE EXISTING SIGN PROVISIONS CONTAINED IN THE COUNTY ZONING ORDINANCE ADOPTED BY THE CITY AND CREATING A NEW CHAPTER ESTABLISHING SIGN STANDARDS AND PERMIT PROCEDURES
